content.text: Trial 1/5, Stage 'xtraverse': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The red circle indicates the top horizontal section, aligned with the X-axis of the camera frame. The groove axis follows this direction (X-axis).

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
